com.bigdata.rdf.graph.impl.util

Interface IManagedArray<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IArraySlice<T>, Iterable<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ManagedArray

    public interface IManagedArray<T>
extends IArraySlice<T>
    An interface for a managed array. Implementations of this interface may permit transparent extension of the managed array.
    Version:
    $Id: IManagedByteArray.java 4548 2011-05-25 19:36:34Z thompsonbry $
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int capacity()
      Return the capacity of the backing buffer.
      void ensureCapacity(int capacity)
      Ensure that the buffer capacity is a least capacity total values.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.bigdata.rdf.graph.impl.util.IArraySlice

        array, get, get, get, len, off, put, put, put, slice, toArray

    • Method Detail

      • capacity

        int capacity()
        Return the capacity of the backing buffer.

      • ensureCapacity

        void ensureCapacity(int capacity)
        Ensure that the buffer capacity is a least capacity total values. The buffer may be grown by this operation but it will not be truncated.
        Parameters:
        capacity - The minimum #of values in the buffer.
